BEGIN 
		 print Step 1: Initialize system....
			InitializedSystem()...
	 print Step 2: Check Satellite Status...
			status <- 
			
			IF status == OK THEN
	print  Step 3: Align Antenna
			position <- Get
			target <- Get
			AlignAntenna(position,          )
		
 	print   Step 4: Establish Communication Link
			success <- EstablishCommunicationLink()
			IF success THEN
 	print   Step 5: Authenticate Connection
 	print   Step 6: Test Communication Link
				linkTest <- TestCommunicationLink()
				
				IF linkTest          THEN
 	print   Step 7: Activate Operational Mode
					ActivateOperationalMode()
	END
